original_title: Zombie Bloodbath 2: Rage of the Undead
overview: An evil demonic scarecrow resurrects the dead as ravenous cannibalistic zombies who feast on the living. A motley assortment of folks who include a bunch of bickering college kids, a trio of dangerous escaped convicts, an equally lethal pair of savage hoodlums, and three sisters do their best to stay alive and survive this harrowing ordeal.
title: Zombie Bloodbath 2: Rage of the Undead
